channel.title: AoE II: Forgotten Empires
channel.description:
www.forgottenempires.net
It's pretty much a really cool expansion pack for the original age of empires 2. New civs, A LOT better AI (You can still use the standard AI, but there are other options like the new AI, barbarian, and some others), a new campaign that really is not all that bad.
This is completely free, but you just have to have both Age of Empires 2 installed, and it's expansion The Conquerers Expansion. If you don't have them then you can always torrent them.
Gameranger (if you don't know about it) is recommended too so you can easily find games to play online. This is also used for other Age of Empires games.
Anyways, I'm posting this because I want someone to play with, and to see if anyone knows about this then my few posts about it in the AoE2: HD thread.
Me and Randqm have been playing games, even though he dies early on :P
